title: Capture Card Setup (Blackmagic UltraStudio) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: Krazy Ken and Brainiac Brent unite to setup a Blackmagic UltraStudio Mini Recorder capture card. You'd think that'd be boring, but they make it funespecially when a unexpected guest arrives  Watch the Blackmagic URSA Mini unboxing   Want more videos like this?   Subscribe for new content!    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures #60 - Capture Card Setup (Blackmagic UltraStudio)  Contact the CC    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?   Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.
